summary: transmissible gastroenteritis virus (TGEV) infects swine of all ages. mortality rate is near 100% in newborn piglets. underlying mechanism of TGEV invasion remains largely unknown. the cytotoxic test of IPEC-J2 cells and the inhibitory effect of Ferristatin II.
